Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable stay”
Reviews.Author: SueSimpson292
Reviews.Content: checked reviews hotel booked arrived feeling anxious staying am pleased pleasantly surprised relieved twin top floor spacious clean bedding clean beds comfortable ensuite totally adequate clean agree decor brightening carpets seen days clean tidy staff friendly helpful breakfast basic uninspiring honest doesnt eat breakfast adequate location paddington underground excellent literally 5 mins walk checked breakfast day train booked til 7pm evening leave luggage hotel day grateful believe bad reviews hotel found value money hesitate booking stay

Reviews.Title: “Terrible”
Reviews.Author: Dave W
Reviews.Content: booked triple tiny double 3 single beds pushed bed floor space left 3 people move mirror bedroom plug near bathroom mirror hairdryer fan main light bathroom moved beds try create walkway middle bed draught windows uncomfortable poorest continental breakfast seen sultry staff unhappy 915 breakfast finished 930 rating avoid

Reviews.Title: “doesn't even deserve a rating of one!”
Reviews.Author: Liz C
Reviews.Content: partner fiancee trip london booked advance royal cambridge location getting train arriving paddington station pros key 4 basement tired worn swing goldfish plug socket tv noisy boiler outside window couldnt window fresh air sleep fair reasonably clean worst breakfast cold boiled eggs cold congealed beans dry sausages offer sat time own toast warm poor manager reasonably nice staff stood outside front door smoking time unhelpful promoting hotel yes cheap suppose pay dont photos doesnt look oh whoever slamming doors 2am shot 6am breakfast luckily didnt spend time spoil stay

Reviews.Title: “Nothing royal about this one”
Reviews.Author: Mark W
Reviews.Content: run dont walk hotel barely clean smelled badly bathroom horrible light switch caused fuse blow resulted electricity told available worse thats direct quote person reception desk

Reviews.Title: “Health & Safety would have a field day!!”
Reviews.Author: missbbAustralia
Reviews.Content: offset stay royal cambridge pretty dismal corners doorways taped unfriendly manor welcomed bedroom underground ventilation aircon cleanliness poor carpet hadnt hovered stray hairs left table tops flooding bathroom shower sliding shower doors missing upgrade customer service border hilarious kindly move slightly quality sleep minimal snowing outside tropics bedroom topped unfriendly comedy act breakfast key check glad stayed night sorry rudely reviewed seriously idea hotels survived 90s brush customer service dont handy plumbing electrics decorating

Reviews.Title: “Stay away - disgusting”
Reviews.Author: HeronWales
Reviews.Content: awful hotel dirty bedding dirty bathroom mould tiny heating breakfast joke served basement night rip

Reviews.Title: “Fine for a bed for the night”
Reviews.Author: yoshee77
Reviews.Content: wasnt intending spend time clean comfortable bed decent shower 3 stayed ground floor didnt issue stairs mentioned breakfast bog standard woken fairly thin walls night job bearing mind cost 23 times amount stay chain hotel

Reviews.Title: “One night only - and that was enough”
Reviews.Author: elliemrocks
Reviews.Content: booked hotel friends hen weekend cheap near public transport links paddington main line tubes 5 min walk thank goodness stayed night checking told pay credit card 7 charge despite checking booked 2 noisy 3rd 4th floor size double bed adult sized beds reasonably clean wiring coming bathrooms tv milk tea tray fridge cool hot little air windows imagine dismay following morning uncomfortable hot night shower advice booking people pleasent dont expect value quality travelodge

Reviews.Title: “Breakfast BADD but rest of the hotel fine”
Reviews.Author: GMV_KFC
Reviews.Content: clean bed pillow wasnâ´t thin location bus underground dont tube expensive shower wasnt people staying sleep perfect hotel dont expect fine hotel

Reviews.Title: “Dive of a hotel - don't bother!”
Reviews.Author: Happyholidaysos
Reviews.Content: prebooked 2 nights stay location website looked night run disgusting expense paid else 2nd night 3 tiny space luggage except closed cupboard 2 single beds cupboard beds 2 single beds wide kid dirty towels extremely tiny bathroom arrived shower water leaked bathroom floor noisy air conditioner couldnt sleep basement stair dirty linen bags stairs entry breakfast breakfast lot desired cheese bread slices looked days spaced tray feel safe definitely dont regardless location stay

Reviews.Title: “Good location. needs refurb, awful breakfast”
Reviews.Author: elise85
Reviews.Content: hotel access underground road didnt expectations cheap hotel unimpressed window overlooking corridor aircon bathroom clean tired shower gel provided iron hairdrier mirror bathroom 2 girls trying ready tricky breakfast served till 930 choice cereal warm milk toast cold hard boiled eggs fresh coffee warm orange juice worst breakfast actually ill afterwards
